title: THE ISLAND OF BAD DREAMS
description: Detective Logico never wanted to again lay eyes upon the island where Inspector Bratino had died, but when he closed his eyes, it was all he could see. He had to go back, and when he did, there was another murder for him to solve, and another mysterious figure running around.

suspects.name: MISTER SHADOW
suspects.description: A silhouette in shadow. He moves like the wind and he looks like the night.

suspects.name: PRESIDENT AMARANTH
suspects.description: The literal French president. Amaranth loves spending time with his constituents, especially a certain one percent of them.

suspects.name: CAPTAIN SLATE
suspects.description: A real-life astronaut. The first woman to travel around the dark side of the moon, and also the first to be suspected of murdering her copilot.

suspects.name: MIDNIGHT III
suspects.description: He learned filmmaking from his father and business from his grandfather. But at murder, he's a natural.

weapons.name: AN AXE
weapons.description: Left on the island. Maybe for good reason.

weapons.name: A BROOM
weapons.description: People say that witches fly on these, but Logico's only swept with them.

weapons.name: A CRYSTAL SKULL
weapons.description: Maybe an actual alien's skull, or maybe just a fun art project.

weapons.name: AN 'ALIEN' ARTIFACT
weapons.description: Maybe real, probably fake. Definitely made of plastic.

locations.name: THE DEAD WOODS
locations.description: You can almost feel the ancient ruins buried within these dead woods.

locations.name: THE WRECKED CRUISE SHIP
locations.description: Once a fashionable cruise liner, now wrecked and rusted.

locations.name: THE RUINED CHURCH
locations.description: The roof has caved in and the church is spoiled.

locations.name: THE CLIFFSIDE LIGHTHOUSE
locations.description: They have now replaced the fire with an automatic LED light that is significantly cheaper.

clues: The suspect who wanted to help win a war had a weapon made of plastic.
An Aquarius was lit by an LED light. It was not flattering.
Captain Slate was found babbling in the dead woods.
Midnight III did not want to save face. He didn't care about face.
Whoever was beneath a caved-in roof was right-handed.
An axe was found near a rusted hull.
Whoever was in the ruined church was right-handed.
A crystal skull was glittering in the moonlight of the outdoors.
A piece of straw was found by the body.
